resources.string: Device locked. Open cover to view more details.
Open cover to view message details.
Open cover to view notification details.
Open cover to view call details.
Double tap and drag to open Camera.
Double tap and drag to open Favourite contacts.
To use the pinned app, open the cover.
This app can show information through the S View window.

Download and install additional features for LED View Cover. You can create your own LED icons and set them as your notification icons. To download them later, go to Settings > Accessories > LED View Cover, then select Download additional features.
Double tap to open notification from %s.
Double tap to open notification panel.
Ready to connect when network quality improves
Checking the quality of your Internet connection…
Connected to device for Internet access.
Enable Bluetooth tethering on the paired device to access the Internet on this device.
Connected for call and media audio
Unable to pair with %1$s. Make sure %2$s is ready to pair.
Speed at which the text is spoken.
Set language-specific voice for spoken text.
Play short demonstration of speech synthesis.
Install voice data required for speech synthesis.
This speech synthesis engine may collect all speech, including passwords, credit card numbers, and other personal data. Continue?
A network connection is required to support %s.
Reset the pitch at which text is read out to the default setting.
%1$s: %2$s left until fully charged via AC
%1$s: %2$s left until fully charged via USB
Unable to use Bluetooth tethering while connected to Wi-Fi network.
Maximised for best viewing in sunlight
This function allows you to pin an app on your device screen so that you cannot navigate away from it.
While an app is pinned, notifications from other apps will be blocked and other functions, such as calling and messaging, may not be available.
While an app is pinned, notifications will be blocked and other functions may not be available.
To unpin an app, press and hold the Recents and Back keys at the same time.
To unpin an app, press and hold the Menu and Back keys at the same time.
To unpin application, press and hold the recents key.
To unpin application, press and hold the menu key.
This app does not support Pin windows.
Unable to pin app. %s closed. Unknown error occurred.
There is not enough space in your device storage. Delete some files and try again.
Not enough space in device storage. Delete some files and try again.
Unable to capture screenshot. Prevented by security policy.
Select the function you want to add to the quick settings panel.
Unable to open %s in Emergency mode.
Unable to open %s in Ultra power saving mode.
Unable to open %s in Maximum power saving mode.

"To use this function, download the following application:
%s"
Unable to connect to network. No network found with the name %s.
Security policy prevents use of Wi-Fi.
Security policy restricts use of Internet sharing.
Failed to connect to Wi-Fi AP.
Authentication failed. Check ID and password.
The AP names for over %1$d networks have been saved. We recommend you delete the oldest %2$d AP names for a smoother Wi-Fi experience.
Turn on Bluetooth to see a list of devices you can pair with or have already paired with.
Select how long to keep the device muted before returning to the previous sound mode (%s).
To see available networks, turn on Wi-Fi.
"Using high brightness levels for long periods may cause eye strain and increase battery consumption. Tap OK to allow the brightness to be increased above safe levels."
Unable to enable Ultra data saving mode while in Flight mode. Disable Flight mode and try again.

Enable this mode to filter all incoming calls. You will only be notified about the urgent calls while you are driving. You will not be able to use your device while driving. You can also view calls that were missed while S bike mode was enabled, send automatic text messages containing your estimated journey time to selected contacts when they call, view travel information, and earn badges.
Drag the quick setting buttons to the area above to add them to the quick settings panel.
Unable to remove button. Minimum number of buttons (%d) reached.
Insert a SIM card to use Mobile hotspot and other tethering functions.
Insert a SIM card to use Mobile Hotspot and other tethering options.
Insert a SIM card to use Wi-Fi tethering.
Insert a UIM/SIM card to use Mobile hotspot and other tethering functions.
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is enabled. Disable Flight mode and try again.
Insert SIM card to access network services.
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is enabled. Disable Flight mode and try again.
Unable to use VoLTE while Flight mode enabled. Disable Flight mode and try again.
Unable to disable Use VoLTE when available during VoLTE call.
Service provider not allowed to disable VoLTE.
VoLTE is not supported by your current software version. Contact customer services for more details.
To use the VoLTE service, subscribe to VoLTE. Contact your service provider for details.
Unable to turn on %s. Camera light being used by Camera.
%1$s and %2$s cannot be enabled at same time.
%1$s and %2$s cannot be enabled at the same time. %3$s will be disabled.
%s and the options below cannot be enabled at the same time. The options below will be disabled.
Wi-Fi calling needs to use your location information. Anonymous location data will be collected and sent to Google and your service provider. Contact your service provider for details.

Wi-Fi calling needs to use your location information. Location will be enabled. Anonymous location data will be collected and sent to Google and your service provider. Contact your service provider for details.
Private mode not available in work profile.
Unable to disable Private mode while moving items to Private.

"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will no longer be able to use Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection.
Mobile data will be disabled."

"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use the Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection.
Turn off Mobile data?"

"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection. Your phone will not be able to use Video Calling while Mobile data is off. Turn off Mobile data?"

"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will no longer be able to use Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection.
Mobile data will be turned off."

"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will no longer be able to use Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection.
Mobile data will be turned off."
Mobile data will be turned on. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Mobile data will be turned on. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.

Data roaming may incur additional charges in addition to your domestic flat rate plan. Automatic updates for email or applications may also incur additional charges. Using large-data services such as video or email may incur charges over 20,000 won per minute.
Unable to turn Mobile data on or off while Advanced calling enabled.
Unable to turn on Torch. Battery power low.
Battery power low. Torch will be turned off.

"Your phone can share its approximate location with apps and services like maps, shopping and weather. Apps and services that use your location should inform you. Read the privacy policy of any app or service provider you are considering to understand how they collect, use and share your location information before you use them.
Determining your location will use the mobile network. Data usage will apply."

"Your tablet can share its approximate location with apps and services like maps, shopping and weather.
Apps and services that use your location should inform you. Read the privacy policy of any app or service provider you’re considering to understand how they collect, use and share your location information before you use them.
Determining your location will use the mobile network. Data usage will apply."
GPS location and use of your location data are controlled by the applications you use.
Disabling Location will disable Wi-Fi calling.

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the device to the web. Auto sync will be enabled."

This will reduce data usage and conserve battery power, but you need to sync accounts manually to collect the most recent information. While this is enabled, you will not receive notifications about updates.

Flight mode allows you to turn off calling, messaging and data network features. It also turns off connectivity features such as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. To use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, turn them on in Settings or on the notification panel.
Flight mode allows you to turn off network features, including Wi-Fi. To use Wi-Fi, turn it on in Settings or the notification panel.
Flight mode allows you to disable calling, messaging, and mobile networks functions.
Flight mode allows you to turn off network features, including Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. To use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, turn them on in Settings or the notification panel.

Flight mode allows you to turn off calling, messaging and data network features. It also turns off connectivity features such as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. To use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, turn them on in Settings or on the notification panel.
"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use the Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection. Turn on Airplane mode?"
"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use Internet, Email, Wi-Fi Calling or other apps that require a data connection. Turn on Airplane mode?"
Unable to enable Flight mode while Block power off while locked enabled. Try again after unlocking screen.
Flight mode disabled on demo devices.
Turn on Wi-Fi to use Wi-Fi calling.
To enable %s, detach keyboard cover from device.
Uses GPS, Wi-Fi, and mobile networks to estimate your location.

"Disable calling and messaging functions, and turn off Mobile data.
Wi-Fi and Bluetooth will also be turned off, but can be turned on again in Settings or in the quick settings panel."

Airplane mode turns off all network connections, including mobile data and Wi-Fi. Your phone will not be able to use Video Calling while Airplane mode is on. Turn on Wi-Fi to use apps that require a data connection.
Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection. Your phone will not be able to use Video Calling while Airplane mode is on.
Airplane mode turns off all network connections, including mobile data and Wi-Fi. Turn on Wi-Fi to use apps that require a data connection.
Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use the Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection.
If Mobile data is turned off, your device must be connected to a Wi-Fi network to use services that require a network connection.
Set your device to mute all calls, alerts, and media, except for your selected exceptions.
Silence all calls, alerts and media sound. You can allow exceptions.
Select the orientation of the display.
The camera light may cause low temperature burns when in prolonged contact with the skin. Avoid leaving %s turned on for an extended period.
The screen is optimised for reading. This mode is only available for selected applications.
Reduce eye strain by limiting the amount of blue light emitted by the screen.

Use Wi-Fi" networks to make and receive calls anywhere, without connecting to a mobile network.
The "Wi-Fi calling icon will appear in the notification panel as shown below while the service is available.
%s, Button label, Double tap to view relevant quick settings.
Show the brightness control above the notification panel.
Listening at a high volume for a long time may damage your hearing. Tap OK to allow the volume to be increased above safe levels.
Listening at high volumes for a long time may damage hearing. To increase volume, open cover.
Volume cannot exceed recommended safety limit (%s) while earphones are connected in Kids Mode.
To increase the volume, tap SETTINGS, then disable Media volume limiter or change your volume limit.
Enabling Mobile hotspot will turn off Wi-Fi.
Mobile Hotspot uses your mobile data connection. Your Wi-Fi connection will be turned off.
Enabling Mobile hotspot will turn off WLAN.
Enabling Wi-Fi tethering will turn off Wi-Fi.
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is enabled. Disable Flight mode and try again.
Enabling Mobile hotspot will disconnect any devices currently connected via Wi-Fi Direct.
Enabling Portable WLAN hotspot will disconnect device connected via WLAN Direct.
Mobile hotspot will be enabled. This will increase battery consumption and data usage.
This app may not work properly in Multi window view.
Pin this app to or unpin it from recent apps screen
Tap %s on the title bar of the app window to open apps in split screen view. This icon is shown when the app supports Multi window.
Tap the Split screen icon on the title bar of the app window to open apps in split screen view. This icon is shown when the app supports Multi window.
Press and hold the Recents key while using an app in full screen view to change to split screen view.
Select a recent app to open on the bottom half of the screen, or go to the Home screen and open a new app in split screen view.

Press the Home key to minimise the app on the top half of the screen in split screen view. If you open another app from the Home screen while an app is minimised, it will be opened on the bottom half of the screen in split screen view.

Tap the Home button to minimise the app on the top half of the screen in split screen view. If you open another app from the Home screen while an app is minimised, it will be opened on the bottom half of the screen in split screen view.
Wi-Fi connection required. Connect to Wi-Fi network and try again.
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is enabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or disable Flight mode and try again.
Mobile data is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or enable mobile data and try again.
Data roaming is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or enable data roaming and try again.
Wi-Fi connection required. Connect to Wi-Fi network and try again.
No signal found for mobile networks.
The use of mobile device while you are walking or driving has a risk of accident.
Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use the Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection.
Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use Internet, Email, Wi-Fi Calling or other apps that require a data connection.
Network does not provide date and time information. Go to Date and time settings to set manually.
Date and time information is not updating automatically. Go to Settings > Date and time to set manually.
Select time zone before setting time.

"Unable to detect a SIM card. Your device will be unable to perform actions such as making calls and connecting to mobile networks.
To protect against water damage, make sure the SIM/SD card tray is firmly sealed."
To protect against water damage, make sure the SIM/SD card tray is firmly sealed.
Moisture has been detected. To charge your device, make sure your charger/USB port is dry.

"Your device is overheating. Steps will be taken to cool it down.
You can still use your device, but: - The screen may be dimmed. - The device may slow down. - Charging may be paused.
After the device cools down, performance will return to normal automatically."
Unable to open applications. You can only use the Phone and Contacts applications.

"Your phone is getting hot, so it's taking steps to cool itself down.
You can still use it, but you may notice: - The screen might dim. - The phone might slow down. - Charging might pause.
Your phone will return to normal once it cools down."

"Your tablet is getting too hot, so it’s taking steps to cool itself down.
You can still use your tablet, but you may notice: The screen might dim. The tablet might slow down. Charging might pause.
After the tablet cools down, performance willAutomatically go back to normal."
"Your phone is getting hot. It will now turn off to cool down."
Your tablet is getting too hot. It will now turn off to cool down.
Why did my phone turn off by itself?
Why did my tablet turn off by itself?

"Your phone got hot. It turned off to prevent damage to the phone.
This can be caused by: Using graphics-intensive apps, like video games and navigation apps, for long periods of time. Downloading or uploading large files. Using your phone in a very hot location."

"Your tablet got too hot. It turned off to prevent damage to the tablet.
Overheating can be caused by: Using graphics intensive apps like video games and navigation apps for long periods of time. Downloading or uploading large files. Using your tablet in a very hot location."
Your device is overheating. It will now power off to cool down.
Your device is overheating. To cool down, it will power off in %d seconds.
You will not be able to power on the device again until after it has cooled down.

"Your device overheated. It powered off to prevent damage.
Overheating can be caused by: - Using graphics-intensive apps, such as games and navigation apps, for long periods of time. - Transferring large files. - Using your device in a hot environment."
Tap here to disable Safe mode.
To disable Safe mode, your device will restart. All your apps will then be available.
Tap to turn off Safe Mode.
Do you want to restart your phone to turn off Safe Mode? All of your apps will be restored.
Charge your device or tap here to enable Power saving mode.
Connect your device to a charger.
Switching from cable charging to wireless charging
Switching from wireless charging to cable charging
To charge faster, use the original charger.
To charge faster, use the charger and cable that were provided with this phone
Your battery life has been extended.
Charge your device or tap here to enable Power saving mode.
Unable to charge your device. Make sure you are using a Samsung compatible battery and charger and that your device is properly connected to the charger.
Unable to charge your device. Make sure you are using a Galaxy compatible battery and charger and that your device is properly connected to the charger.
Charging paused. Battery temperature too high.
Charging paused. Battery temperature too low.

"The device has stopped charging. The battery temperature is too high. Be careful when disconnecting the charger. It may be very hot.
Disconnecting and reconnecting the charger may allow charging to continue normally. If overheating persists, contact customer services as there may be a risk of fire or injury."

The connected charger is incompatible with this phone. To prevent damage to your phone, charging has been stopped. To continue charging, use the original charger and cable that were provided with this phone.
Unable to charge. Use the original charger.
This device is charging another device that is connected via USB. This increases the battery consumption of this device. Disconnect the USB cable to stop charging the connected device.
Use fingerprint to open or swipe screen to use iris instead
Use fingerprint to unlock or swipe screen to use iris instead
Use fingerprint or swipe screen to open
Use fingerprint or swipe screen to unlock
Swipe screen to use iris to unlock
Swipe screen with two fingers to open.
Swipe with two fingers to unlock the screen.
Double tap and drag to lock device.
Unable to use USIM card. Download USIM card information.
Insert USIM card, then restart device
Cannot use USIM card. Incorrect PIN unlock (PUK) code entered %d times. Purchase new USIM card.
"USIM card not detected Emergency calls only"
Search phone and scan for nearby devices

"Hongbao assistant will be enabled. This function will allow you to receive WeChat red envelopes more quickly and get notifications when they are received. A network connection is required. You can enable and disable this function via the quick settings panel."
Receive WeChat red envelopes more quickly and get notifications when they are received. Tap here to enable this function.
Specified data usage limit reached. Additional data use may incur charges from service provider.

"You've reached your specified data usage limit, so mobile data has been turned off.
If you turn mobile data back on, you may be charged for data usage by your carrier."
Connect earphones to use UHQ upscaler.
Enhance the sound resolution of music and videos for a clearer listening experience.
Select an app to open when you press and hold the Home key. To change the selected app later, go to Device assistance app in Settings.
SIM locked. Enter PUK. Contact service provider for details.
Type PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers
Your PUK should contain 8 digits or more.
The PINs you have entered do not match.

"You have entered an incorrect PIN %1$d times.
Try again in %2$d seconds."
You have entered an incorrect password %1$d times. Try again in %2$d seconds.
You have made %1$d unsuccessful attempts to unlock your device. Try again in %2$d seconds.
An incorrect password has been entered. You have %d attempts left before the device is reset to factory default settings and all data is erased.
An attempt to unlock the device has been made. You have %d attempts left before the device is reset to factory default settings and all data is erased, including files and downloaded apps.

An attempt to unlock the device has been made %1$d times. You have %2$d attempts left before the device is reset to factory default settings and all data is erased, including files and downloaded apps.
An attempt to unlock the device has been made %d times. You have 1 attempt left before the device is reset to factory default settings and all data is erased, including files and downloaded apps.
Draw series of directions to unlock screen
Use iris or draw series of directions
Your device was restarted and needs to be unlocked using your series of directions. You can use your biometrics next time you unlock your device.
Your device was restarted and needs to be unlocked using your series of directions. You can use your irises next time you unlock your device.
Draw series of directions instead of using biometric recognition because of security policy
Draw series of directions instead of using iris recognition because of security policy
Your device has not been used for more than 24 hours and needs to be unlocked using your series of directions. You can use your biometrics next time you unlock your device.
Your device has not been used for more than 24 hours and needs to be unlocked using your series of directions. You can use your irises next time you unlock your device.

"If you do not enter the correct PIN within the next %d attempts, your phone will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

"If you do not enter the correct PIN in the next attempt, your phone will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

"If you do not enter the correct PIN within the next %d attempts, your tablet will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the tablet will be erased.
If your tablet is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this tablet to be able to use it again."

"If you do not enter the correct PIN in the next attempt, your tablet will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the tablet will be erased.
If your tablet is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this tablet to be able to use it again."

If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

"If you do not enter the correct pattern in the next attempt, your phone will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

If your tablet is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this tablet to be able to use it again."

If your tablet is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this tablet to be able to use it again."

Tap %s on the title bar of the app window to open apps in split screen view. This icon is shown when the app supports Multi window.
Tap the Split screen icon on the title bar of the app window to open apps in split screen view. This icon is shown when the app supports Multi window.
Press and hold the Recents key while using an app in full screen view to change to split screen view.

If you press the Home key while using split screen view, the app shown on the top half of the screen will be minimised. If you open an app from the home screen while the status bar is coloured blue, the app will open in split screen view on the bottom half of the screen.

"If you do not draw the correct series of directions in the next attempt, your phone will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."
